div.div:
Daniel - June 19, 2012 - ZTE X500 with version 1.1
More planets!
There arent enough planets to pick from, nice to be able to customize background with asteroids or shooting stars. But, very impressed just if we aren't gunna get more planets to choose from then make the onez we do have less boring of a surface

kramari - June 18, 2012 - HTC Sensation 4G with version 1.1
Very nice!
I love it, looks great. Add a few space battles here and there and it will be even better :D Also more planets :)

Tiana - June 29, 2012 - Samsung Nexus S with version 1.1
Beautiful
Works perfectly and doesn't drain my battery like most LWP. I don't ever buy apps etc but I'm glad I bought this on a whim. Only "complaint" is the planets are some what similar looking to me. But other than that, its a gorgeous lwp pack

travis - June 11, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.1
Best live wall paper I've ever used.
Not only is this gorgeous but the main thing I love about it is it truly does not drain my battery. Most lwp's that I've tried in the past showed significant battery drain. This one somehow fixed that band put all the rest to shame as far as the visual. Only request I can make is to add a few more planets to the mix. I heard somewhere of something like a death star looking planet. That will be killer. Thanks for the amazing work.

Scott - June 7, 2012 - Version 1.1
Masterpiece
I love having wallpapers like this on my computers. I wish that there were even more than this available. I have the galaxy pack also, and I would encourage anyone who likes/loves this type of pix to spend the money. To me it's completely worth the money. To the author: If your looking for any other ideas for more live wallpapers to make, how about a pack with different types of suns, asteroid belts, comets, planets rotating suns, binary star systems. I hope to see more work from you in the near future.

Purrpussful - June 20, 2012 - Galaxy S2 Skyrocket with version 1.1
It's a treat!
Long ago I asked the dev to fix a glitch on their Web site that prevented me from making a donation. I'm very pleased to have purchased this and the Galaxy Pack to encourage them too continue their outstanding work. Well done!

carlos - June 28, 2012 - HTC Desire HD with version 1.1
Is an ok app, but am only showing one planet instead of six planets. ...
Is an ok app, but am only showing one planet instead of six planets. :'( money spend not worthed

oddy - June 10, 2012 - HTC One X with version 1.1
HTC one X issue
Option "Animation when screen is moving" does not work.

Meriam - June 21, 2012 - Galaxy Tab 10.1 with version 1.1
Stunning
Stunningly pretty and subtle. I love all the Maxelus wallpapers, but this may be my favorite. Runs beautifully on my Galaxy Tab 10.1.

Ryan - June 17, 2012 - Version 1.1
Very nice!
Works great on Galaxy Nexus and Transformer Prime. Smooth when changing screens left/right. Lots of options. Would love to see an option to tint the clouds (not just the white color) to mix with the atmosphere options. Also, would love an option to show a nebula in the background or something like that. Overall, one of the best I've seen! Note: It has a 'on battery' option to reduce battery drain. Excellent!

Taira - June 19, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.1
It's fun for a time
It's fun to play with for about 15 min. Then gets boring. It is, however, still very beautiful.

Gabba - June 16, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Note with version 1.1
Excellent.
One of the best LWP I've ever seen. Keep up the good work!

tburt - June 15, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.1
Looks great!
Runs great on my Galaxy S 2 Touch 4G. One of the best screen savers I have seen.

Alex - June 28, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S3 with version 1.1
Amazing
This live wallpaper is stunning. Well worth the money and look forward to future updates.

Joel - June 10, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.1
Super cool
First lwp I've left on my phone for longer than a day or two. Easy on battery, no noticeable lag on GNex (a little bit on Galaxy Tab 10.1 though), and gorgeous.

Nicholas - June 14, 2012 - LG Optimus 2X with version 1.1
*********************EPIC************************
just buy this it is worth 100 dollars

Christopher - June 7, 2012 - Version 1.1
Does not play well with Widgetlocker
This app does not work well with widgetlocker. When unlocking phone, planets become larger than normal and almost black. It stays that way until you disable widgetlocker and reload planets.

Michael - June 11, 2012 - HTC Desire HD with version 1.1
Always the best
Been a fan since day one. Did not hesitate to buy.

Dan - June 6, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.1
Great wallpaper!
I really like this one. :-) It would be awesome if you offered an option for rings though.

Jared - June 8, 2012 - Motorola Droid X2 with version 1.1
Supa Sweeet
Just take my advice and go for anything this publisher makes. They amaze me simply because they are always updating with fixes and new wallpapers to keep it fresh. Droid X2

Arturo - June 22, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.1
Awesome
Very cool and gorgeous!

Davey - June 8, 2012 - HTC Sensation 4G with version 1.1
Wow
Bought the galaxy pack, amazing, had to buy the planet's, awesome. Best live wallpaper out there, keep them coming. A1

Nice
Great on GS3! Me likey

David - June 7, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S3 with version 1.1

Love it!!!!

Peter - June 6, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.1
Fabulous

Rob - June 13, 2012 - HTC One X with version 1.1
Awesome!!!
Works perfect on HTC one x and is besutiful.. no noticeable battery drain

Savoeun - June 12, 2012 - HTC One S with version 1.1
Must have

The Hitman - July 2, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.1
Incredible! Looks amazing!!
One of of the Best Live Wallpapers available. Worth the money!!

Tim - July 1, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Note with version 1.1
T LOVE it
Cool graphics and design love it on my note

Michael K - July 3, 2012 - Version 1.1
Highest quality you can imagine
I love the idea of live wallpapers, but even if I find ones that I love, I always end up going back to static wallpapers because 1) smoothness and 2) nothing ever looks quite as crisp as a good HD picture. This LWP is the exception. This thing looks gorgeous. It has that bright, crisp "pop" that HD images have, and the entire thing is so customizable and runs SO smoothly. I've had fantastic battery life while using it and I could not be happier. Only suggestions? More green/blue planets compared to red ones?

Ricardo - May 16, 2012 - HTC EVO 3D with version 1.0
Real nice
Love it. I also agree that adding weather effects such as lightning would be awesome. Also this is a very minor complaint but the planets seem a little low poly. I know it can't be too high because it's for a cell phone but making the planet spheres smoother is just what it needs to make it perfect.

Andrew - June 2, 2012 - HTC EVO 3D with version 1.0
Visually Appealing
Lots of customization, fun, and beautiful graphics. This was the best spent two bucks I've spent in a long time.

Bevan - May 16, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.0
Very nice
Great looking planets! Doesn't scroll as nicely as I would like. Could do with some settings cleaned up. Will be an easy 5 with a few tweaks.

GC - May 27, 2012 - Sony Tablet S with version 1.0
Fantastic
Have had the free galaxy wallpapers for a while. Hesitated to pay for a wallpaper but they looked so awesome I couldn't resist and you can tell some work has gone into this, so i'm very satisfied with the result.

Garry - May 17, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.0
Nice app
This is quite nice, colourful but would be great if there was a sun rise and corona that came from behind the planets. Also a little more control over the planet surface would be nice. Good app

Paul - May 15, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.0
Amazing
Great job on this pack.. updated galaxies pack and saw the link for this and instantly bought it... these are the only lwp's I ever use

Marshall - May 17, 2012 - Dell Blaze with version 1.0
Amazing as usual
There's no comparison to Maxelus LWPs, and this new planets pack proves it. Gorgeous planets, plenty of settings, not too hard on batteries... just great!

Chris - May 13, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.0
Why???
Why do you keep making such PHENOMINAL live wallpapers??? I'm trying to not spend my credit card, and yoy just keep coming at me with all this absolutely amazing stuff ;) Keep it up :D

Melanie - May 13, 2012 - Droid Bionic with version 1.0
Genius Strikes Again!
Gorgeous. Unique. Flawless. Outstanding. Buy Now:)

Tom - June 6, 2012 - Samsung Infuse 4G with version 1.0
Excellent
When i first seen this live wallpaper i was unsure about. Once i purchased it and seen it actually running on my phone i was amazed. Good colors, very smooth and no lag. Buy it.

Penny - June 1, 2012 - Droid Bionic with version 1.0
Another impeccable design from Maxelus!
Seriously, nobody does it better then this dev...he never disappoints :)I will buy anything of his w/out even seeing it! Excellent as usual my friend :)

Stephen - May 30, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.0
Beautiful but laggy on my GNex
I will be buying again once it runs smooth on galaxy nexus. Love this and other LWP

Justin - May 14, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.0
Amazing!
Continues to be my favorite LWP dev. Was surprised to find this on the market as I checked yesterday and didn't see it. Looks great, runs smooth and has nice customization options. Love it!

VNVJeep - May 16, 2012 - Droid Bionic with version 1.0
Excellent
Once again.... incredible job. Already a big fan of the galaxy pack, this is a welcome addition! Droid bionic.

Ant1 - June 4, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S3 with version 1.0
Also not working
No good on the Samsung S3. Just black screen... 3 stars because it looks good in principle.

Richard - June 5, 2012 - LG Optimus One with version 1.0
Another awesome wallpaper
This developer is the best. Very high quality wallpapers and very customizable. I have this pack, galaxy pack, the free galaxy wallpapers, and the 3d aquarium wallpaper. All worth it!

Andi - May 16, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Note with version 1.0
Wooww
Good job maxelus..u did great :)..Paid my 3D fish before this live wallpaper.. Waiting for future update that u promise,maybe auto pan hehehe

Robert - May 19, 2012 - EeePad Transformer TF101 with version 1.0
Stunning
Maxelus are the kings of LWP. Worth every penny!

simon - May 15, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Note with version 1.0
Superb..
.. As usual. I have to say I vastly prefer new earth to the others.. It would be out of this world if it was possible to have a blue version of it.. Maybe even choose the planets colour.

Aubrey - May 20, 2012 - Samsung Nexus S with version 1.0
Stunning. But one thing...
Another amazing live wallpaper. I have the Galaxy Pack too. But there's one thing that I don't like - the shadow effect seems to be made up of 'panels'. As you scroll along, another panel appears or disappears. It looks a bit graphically weird. If you could fix that to make it look more circular and fade more smoothly, it would perfect. I'm still rating 5 stars though, because this live wallpaper is stunning despite.

Joe - May 21, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.0
Just awesome!
I'm buying your LWP's sight unseen and haven't been disappointed yet! Keep it up. These are just awesome!

Hamid - May 16, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.0
O.O
Makes designing live papers so easy and brilliant really.

Matthew Noah - May 30, 2012 - Motorola Droid RAZR with version 1.0
Fantastic!
So many options and beautiful. Excellent just like all maxellus wallpapers. Would like the planet more fully lit and the atmosphere colors a little less bright, but still love it. Not a battery hog either

cody - May 25, 2012 - Version 1.0
Best evar
Hands down the best lwp ever! HD very smooth and crisp colours. I love the custom options. Great work yet again. Had the galaxy pack as my wallpaper for ever. Not any more

nathan - May 30, 2012 - SEMC Xperia Arc S with version 1.0
: )
love this lwp it so smooth and looks amazing. it looks a quality lwp. but please fix the bug where it keeps flashing red whenever unlocking please :)

Talha - May 15, 2012 - Version 1.0
Beautiful as always
Wallpapers like this make me grateful to God for granting me this device and for devs like you guys who create such amazing beauty. However the planets can occupy too much of the screen. It would be nice to have some zoom and angle customization

Apostolos - May 16, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.0
Awesome
Another great work. I am in your fan club.

Tina - May 15, 2012 - Version 1.0
Wonderful!
Maxelus has done it again for sure. I'm loving this new lwp! Honestly don't think I dislike a single lwp from you guys. Keep up the fantastic job!

Awesome

Amazing

Leon - June 9, 2012 - Version 1.0
HTC rezound
Was awesome for a day, now no matter what I do with the setting almost the entire planet is just black, looks great in the preview & looked great yesterday. - Update - starting working again, maybe its just my phone

You did it again!!!
